name: Super Cyanide
description:
Hello! My name is Martijn, I am an 18 year old developer. I mainly develop in Java and picked up GML as a first language to start the learning process. I ever only released one other game though, an arcade game called Asteroid Avoid for android devices (It should still be up if you want to check it out). I really love experimenting with different game ideas and appreciate any feedback for this game!

I hope you enjoy the game!
